name: Solidified Essence
description: A chunk of essence solidified from the air, impure and useless for transmutation. You can boil this into a liquid form.
This is a simple heater powered by burning essence.  It is designed for cooking food.

name: Essence-electric capacitor
description: This is effectively a rock tricked into thinking it's a capacitor that can capture essence from the air, convert it into electricity, and store it, releasing it later. This is for electronics, magic items already function this way.

HOLY SHIT THIS THING IS ON FIRE! Oh, it doesn't spread, and it only heats what you want it to. It's safe enough to store in your backpack and will recharge over time, but it's huge and acts as a rigid object.  Due to being an open flame, it emits light.

use_action.msg: You enclose the fire in a box.

description: HOLY SHIT THIS THING IS ON FIRE! Oh, it doesn't spread, and it only heats what you want it to. It's safe enough to store in your backpack and will recharge over time, but it's huge and acts as a rigid object.  It's stuck in a box, so it doesn't make light.

name: magic lighter
description: This is your ability to start a fire effortlessly using your elemental magic. After an inital mana cost it's trivial to maintain.

name: magic soldering iron
description: This is your ability to solder electronics via magic. Due to your initial investment of essence, it recharges at a steady rate per hour, and stores a great deal of power but cannot be unloaded or reloaded.

name: magic welder
description: This is your ability to weld via magic. Due to your initial investment of essence, it recharges at a steady rate per hour, and stores a great deal of power but cannot be unloaded or reloaded.
The ability for your magic tool to hold power. Load with rune charges. Being deprecated for now because I don't think its a good idea, refund yourself the cost via debug.
A clay tablet enchanted with a quantum rune. On throwing to the floor it will teleport you to a portal gateway you've previously built. Think of the gate and happy thoughts.

name: Novice Artificing
description: This is your ability to mimic simple tools using magic instead of tools. You're not very good at this.

name: Intermediate Artificing
description: This is your ability to mimic simple tools using magic instead of tools. You can mimic most tools.

name: Advanced Artificing
description: This is your ability to mimic simple tools using magic instead of tools. You can mimic any tools.

name: Telekinetic flesh manipulation
description: This is your dedicated ability to delicately take apart corpses. These tools are the most precise hand tools you will ever use.

name: Telekinetic jacking
description: This is your ability to jack cars and lift things, additionally it lets you siphon liquids the same way as a hose. The ability to jack off is not included, your lewd thought is noted.

name: magic light orb
description: A small light that siphons essence passively from its surroundings. With a thought you can disable it.

name: magic light orb (off)
description: A small light that siphons essence passively from its surroundings. It is currently off.

name: magic floodlight
description: A small light that siphons essence passively from its surroundings and generates a ton of light. With a thought you can disable it.

name: magic floodlight (off)
description: A small light that siphons essence passively from its surroundings and generates a ton of light. It is currently off.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. This one is tiny inside, about backpack sized.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. You spent extra mana to make this watertight.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. This one is small inside, about hiking bag.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. This one can be classed as a Lesser dimension.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. This one can be classed as a Greater dimension, it can store a ridiculous amount.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. You ensured that it's quick to draw a sword out of this dimension in addition to storing a lot.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. You ensured that it's quick to draw a firearm or bow out of this dimension in addition to storing a lot.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. You reserved almost all of for holstering guns, only saving a few liters for loose items like bullets.

A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. You set all Birmingham or London jokes aside and filled it with knives. You also recall an anime involving an unlimited amount of blades.

A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. You reserved almost all of it for bringing the hardware store with you, only saving a few nooks for loose nails and such.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. You can use it to stash firearm magazines.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. You can store a lot of fluids in here.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. The space inside is huge, you could probably hide in there if you wanted.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. You'll never need to worry about storage again.
A small invisible hole in reality that only you can use to store and withdraw things. You can carry the ocean with you.

A small invisible hole in reality that isn't stable enough to be used in person. Once you mount it to a vehicle frame it will store either 500 or 1000 liters of liquid or solids. You could wear it, but you will gain no benefit beyond knowing it won't get lost.

name: Elemental Awakening potion
description: You had a dream this would unlock magical powers within you. Made from purifying essence from distilling tained flesh in ethanol and a small amount of gasoline, and condensing the essence with charcoal, it will poison and cripple you for an entire week. This mixture will give you powers over the elements.

name: Spirit Awakening potion
description: You had a dream this would unlock magical powers within you. Made from purifying essence from distilling tained flesh in ethanol and a small amount of gasoline, and condensing the essence with charcoal, it will poison and cripple you for an entire week. This mixture will let you control the dead and living.

name: Transmutation Awakening potion
description: You had a dream this would unlock magical powers within you. Made from purifying essence from distilling tained flesh in ethanol and a small amount of gasoline, and condensing the essence with charcoal, it will poison and cripple you for an entire week. This mixture will let you bend atoms to your will.

name: Pure Elemental Awakening potion
description: After dabbling in awakening your powers once, you can now make a better potion directly from essence.

name: Pure Spirit Awakening potion
description: After dabbling in awakening your powers once, you can now make a better potion directly from essence.

name: Pure Transmutation Awakening potion
description: After dabbling in awakening your powers once, you can now make a better potion directly from essence.

name: Pale Awakening potion
description: Having a great understanding of all other schools of magic, you know this potion of pure essence will unlock the epitome of what it means to be a mage.

name: Nightwalker regeneration cure
description: A mixture of medicine and a boost of souls to allow your body to heal in both conventional and anomalous ways.
You are being protected from ranged attacks, both thermal and ballistic.
You are being protected from melee attacks.
You are being protected from electro-chemical attacks.
You are being protected from temperature changes that come from your environment.
You are being protected from harmful gases, you won't breathe them in and they won't go through your skin.
You are being protected from glare, no matter how bright.
You are being protected from loud noises.
You are being protected from radiation and acid in your environment.
You are being protected from not being in an oxygen-rich environment, you will not suffocate or drown.
You are being protected from your environments temperature, gases, radiation, oxygen levels, light levels, and sound.

Careful what you wish for! This amulet is imbued with the souls of ten unfortunate dead to allow your body to recover without sleep, but you will suffer a penalty to mental cognition and your physical stamina until you take it off.

name: Spell Tome: Elemental I
description: Your Repository of novice Elemental spells, contains a few basic one's but you'll need to experiment to learn better ones.

name: Spell Tome: Elemental II
description: Your Repository of Intermediate Elemental spells, you're starting to get the hang of this.

name: Spell Tome: Spirit I
description: Your Repository of novice Spirit spells, contains a few basic one's but you'll need to experiment to learn better ones.

name: Spell Tome: Spirit II
description: Your Repository of intermediate Spirit spells.

name: Spell Tome: Transmutation I
description: Your first Repository of Transmutation spells, contains a few basic one's but you'll need to experiment to learn better ones.

name: Spell Tome: Transmutation II
description: Your Repository of Intermediate Transmutation spells.

name: Spell Tome: Construction
description: Your Repository of Construction magic, a type of transmutation.

name: Spell Tome: Druidic trees
description: Your Repository of Druidic tree magic, a type of transmutation.

name: Spell Tome: Necromancy
description: Your Repository of Necromancy magic, focused around summoning monsters.

Magic wasn't so hard, you think you know what you're doing enough to make any spellbook including ones not in your school, but perhaps you should first awaken the other schools of magic to gain more power.
After days of studying and meditation, you've discovered an alternative source of knowledge and power. But what does He want from you?

name: Spell Tome: Pale I
description: Your first Repository of Pale spells, contains a few basic one's but you'll need to experiment to learn better ones.

name: SGA Prayer book (unlocked)
description: An entirely unencrypted book detailing instructions on how to psionically contact the patron guardian and director of the Shi to offer a significant amount of your mana to pray for assistance in combat. You understand how to use this.
